name: Agent Strike
description:
It’s time to show the world your shooting skill! Show off your deadly accuracy with our new music shooting game: Agent Strike. This exciting game will give you a wonderful time to relax and to challenge your skills. Hold your weapons firmly, eliminate all the enemies, and become the best agent in town.


Are you ready to become a hero? Download now!

Game features:

1. Stunning 3D design
2. Multiple levels of increasing difficulty with their own stories
3. High quality and various music genres which suit different music tastes.
